sentences.english: And I have learnt so much about the history of the Roman Colosseum from his lecture.
sentences.chinese: 從今天這堂課上我就學到很多關於羅馬角鬥場的歷史。

sentences.english: Grimlock and Impactor meet Megatron within the arenas.
sentences.chinese: 鋼鎖與撞針於大角鬥場結識威震天。

sentences.english: Oslash; Grimlock and Impactor meet Megatron within the arenas.

sentences.english: Gladiators fought with lions in the arena in Rome.
sentences.chinese: 在古羅馬的角鬥場上，角鬥士與獅子搏鬥。
